title: 多MOD游戏崩溃...
author: polk2004
txt_content:
如题，装了一些MOD之后，好好的客户端，崩了... 二月 23, 2015 11:15:58 上午 net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LogWrapper log
信息: Using tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
2015-02-23 11:15:58 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] Forge Mod Loader version 6.2.62.871 for Minecraft 1.6.2 loading
2015-02-23 11:15:58 [信息] [ForgeModLoader] Java is Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM, version 1.7.0_05, running on Windows 7:x86:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre7
2015-02-23 11:15:58 [信息] [STDOUT] Loaded 39 rules from AccessTransformer config file fml_at.cfg
2015-02-23 11:15:58 [信息] [STDOUT] Loaded 107 rules from AccessTransformer config file forge_at.cfg
2015-02-23 11:15:59 [严重] [ForgeModLoader] Unable to launch
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.SecurityException: Invalid signature file digest for Manifest main attributes
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.injectTransformers(CoreModManager.java:433)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.injectPostfixTransformers(FMLLaunchHandler.java:108)

        at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.injectIntoClassLoader(FMLTweaker.java:80)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:51)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:18)
Caused by: java.lang.SecurityException: Invalid signature file digest for Manifest main attributes
        at sun.security.util.SignatureFileVerifier.processImpl(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.util.SignatureFileVerifier.process(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.processEntry(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.update(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.jar.JarFile.initializeVerifier(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.jar.JarFile.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.jar.JarURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.getClassBytes(LaunchClassLoader.java:351)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.asm.transformers.deobf.FMLDeobfuscatingRemapper.getFieldType(FMLDeobfuscatingRemapper.java:215)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.asm.transformers.deobf.FMLDeobfuscatingRemapper.parseField(FMLDeobfuscatingRemapper.java:196)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.asm.transformers.deobf.FMLDeobfuscatingRemapper.setup(FMLDeobfuscatingRemapper.java:157)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.asm.FMLSanityChecker.injectData(FMLSanityChecker.java:244)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.injectTransformers(CoreModManager.java:428)
        ... 5 more

replies.author: qq3922382
replies.txt_content: 你游戏使用的1.7.10，mod却使用1.6.2，你到底会不会玩？

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
protocol
这是个什么鬼。。
你试试用rar依次打开mod，看看里面是不是多了点什么，比如jar，zip神马的。

replies.author: polk2004
replies.txt_content:
qq3922382 发表于 2015-2-23 11:43
你游戏使用的1.7.10，mod却使用1.6.2，你到底会不会玩？
拜托，大哥，那是MOD版本。哎，我去试试删掉META-INF

Unable to launch
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.SecurityException: Invalid signature file digest for Manifest main attributes

无法启动
java.lang.runtimeexception（运行时异常，应该就是mod的问题了）：java.lang.securityexception（安全异常）：无效的签名文件的摘要清单主要属性（原因不明）
